name: Liz Biz
description:
Liz Biz is a woodland creature  trading adventure! No, we don't trade woodland creatures, we trade in rocks and nuts and stories and chill forest vibes. This game is short and is the first game I've ever published.

As of v0.1.1, Liz Biz is a tech demo. Other than quests, all major gameplay systems in the final design are present but untuned and occasionally a bit rough. Up next is the quest system followed by several rounds of content production and polish.
